overview: Leroy Jones (Dwight Martin), a black CIA operative, observes Americans dumping nuclear waste in an African country, then being ordered by a superior to keep his mouth shut. Skip to the present and Leroy, now a CIA senior analyst in the U.S., must face the consequences of that cover-up. The buried nuclear waste has contaminated the nationâ€™s cocoa crop, which is used by U.S. manufacturers whose chocolate products, from cereals to Easter eggs, are now spreading radioactive poison around the globe.
title: A True American
